articles.description: Honda has launched the CB350 RS priced at Rs. 1.96 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi). The CB350 RS is a slightly sporty version of the H'Ness CB350, where 'RS' stands for 'Road Sailing'. Honda has also tweaked the riding position by moving the foot pegs rearward.
articles.content:
